answers.answer: You should have a physical exam, checking for diabetes, thyroid disease, things like that.Erections are a reflection of health.  Running is a good way to improve circulation and testosterone levels.
Do you think i should go to just a general doctor or a urologist? Is there anything i could take physically to improve my erections?

question: I'm 19 and for oral sex I'm able to maintain full erection, when it comes down to having sex I lose my erection quickly idk why!? Help!!! It's embarrassing that it's happening so many times and I'm young. Please help !By the time I finish putting on the condom I begin to go flaccid. I've only been able to have intercourse once with my girlfriend and it was without a condom.Please someone help me !
title: Cant maintain erection?!
